name: Zenith Wallet
description: What is the project about? Zenith Wallet is a full product suite ranging from a Snipe/Trade Bot, a Deploy Bot, a Web App, and a Desktop Wallet. What makes your project unique? Zenith is unique in that it is a DeFi Wallet-as-a-Service, all-in-one platform offering interoperability between the feature sets. Zenith’s lucrative referral system allows users to earn up to 0.1 ETH per referred user, 10% of trade fees for life per referred user - for life. History of your project. The past 6 months have been focused around developing and branding efforts. Zenith has been able to accomplish a fully functional Deploy and Trade bot prior to launch. What’s next for your project? Zenith will be rolling out it’s Snipe Bot, Web App, and Desktop Wallet in the coming weeks. What can your token be used for? Token holders will be rewarded with lower fees and access to premium features.
